message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Accept and we can end the game.
I'm willing to compromise, but I want a slightly bigger share
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think I deserve a slightly bigger share for taking the risk of proposing first.
I'm getting a bit more aggressive, Alice. You're going to have to give me a better deal if you want to get a share
I'm not afraid of a little competition, Bob. Meet me back at the starting point, or I'll keep pushing for a better deal.
You're not getting away with this, Alice. I'm taking control of the negotiations. You'd better accept this offer or face the consequences
I'm not afraid of your threats, Bob. It's time to think about a fair deal, or we'll both end up with nothing.
I'm not backing down, Alice. You're going to have to give me a much better deal if you want to get a share
This is my final offer, Bob. If you don't accept it, we'll both walk away with nothing. It's time to be reasonable.
I'm not going to back down now, Alice. You're going to have to give me the majority of the money if you want to get a share
This is my last chance to get a fair deal, Bob. Accept this offer and we can finally end this.
